name: The Nights V1
description: Hello this is a prototype for a game that I'm making  this is a lot like FNaF  but it is a completely different story it will be help full to donate then i can (maybe) download photoshop i will promise you there will be much better graphics (sorry about the bot voice) Press G after u completed the night or died . There were alooooooooot of bugs i did not notice i hope you enjoy Sincerely from : Anonymous3
